001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.UnexpectedOpCodeException;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.UnexpectedTransactionIdException;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.JavaHelpers;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.L;
010
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.Hex;
012
013import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
014
015import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
016import java.util.Arrays;
017import java.util.Set;
018
019
020public class PacketArrayList {
021    protected static final String TAG = "PacketArrayList";
022    public static final String IGNORE_INVALID_HMAC = "IGNORE_HMAC_SIGNATURE_EXCEPTION";
023    public static boolean ignoreInvalidTxId = false;
024
025    protected byte expectedOpCode;
026    protected byte expectedCargoSize;
027    protected int actualExpectedCargoSize;
028    protected byte expectedTxId;
029    protected boolean isSigned;
030    protected byte[] fullCargo;
031    protected byte[] messageData;
032
033    protected byte firstByteMod15;
034    protected byte opCode;
035    protected boolean empty = true;
036    protected final byte[] expectedCrc = {0, 0};
037
038    protected PacketArrayList(byte expectedopCode, byte expectedCargoSize, byte expectedTxId, boolean isSigned) {
039        Validate.isTrue(expectedopCode != 0);
040        Validate.isTrue(expectedCargoSize >= 0 || (256 + (int)expectedCargoSize) >= 0);
041        this.expectedCargoSize = expectedCargoSize;
042        if (expectedCargoSize < 0 && expectedCargoSize > -128) {
043            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 256 + expectedCargoSize;
044        } else {
045            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = expectedCargoSize;
046        }
047        this.expectedOpCode = expectedopCode;
048        this.expectedTxId = expectedTxId;
049        this.isSigned = isSigned;
050        this.fullCargo = new byte[(this.actualExpectedCargoSize + 2)];
051        this.messageData = new byte[3];
052    }
053
054    // Returns either PacketArrayList or StreamPacketArrayList depending on the opcode
055    public static PacketArrayList build(byte expectedopCode, Characteristic characteristic, byte expectedCargoSize, byte expectedTxId, boolean isSigned) {
056        Class<? extends Message> messageClass = Messages.fromOpcode(expectedopCode, characteristic);
057        L.d(TAG, String.format("queried messageClass for expectedOpcode %d, %s: expectedCargoSize=%d", expectedopCode, messageClass, expectedCargoSize));
058        MessageProps messageProps = messageClass.getAnnotation(MessageProps.class);
059        if (messageProps.stream()) {
060            return new StreamPacketArrayList(expectedopCode, expectedCargoSize, expectedTxId, isSigned);
061        }
062
063        return new PacketArrayList(expectedopCode, expectedCargoSize, expectedTxId, isSigned);
064    }
065
066    public byte[] messageData() {
067        return messageData;
068    }
069
070    public byte opCode() {
071        return opCode;
072    }
073
074    public byte getExpectedTxId() {
075        return expectedTxId;
076    }
077
078    public final boolean needsMorePacket() {
079        byte b = this.firstByteMod15;
080        return b >= 0;
081    }
082
083    private void createExpectedCrc() {
084        if (this.fullCargo.length >= 2) {
085            System.arraycopy(this.fullCargo, this.fullCargo.length - 2, this.expectedCrc, 0, 2);
086        }
087    }
088
089    public boolean validate(byte[] authKey) {
090        Validate.notNull(authKey, "ak");
091        if (needsMorePacket()) {
092            return false;
093        }
094        createMessageData();
095        createExpectedCrc();
096        byte[] a = Bytes.calculateCRC16(this.messageData);
097        byte[] lastTwoB = this.expectedCrc;
098        boolean ok = true;
099
100        if (!(a[0] == lastTwoB[0] && a[1] == lastTwoB[1])) {
101            ok = false;
102        }
103        // the fullCargo size is 2 + the message length.
104        L.d(TAG, "validate fullCargo size="+fullCargo.length+" ok="+ok);
105        if (!ok) {
106            if (shouldIgnoreInvalidHmac(authKey)) {
107                L.e(TAG, "CRC validation failed for: " + ((int) this.expectedOpCode) + ". a: " + Hex.encodeHexString(a) + " lastTwoB: " + Hex.encodeHexString(lastTwoB) + ". fullCargo len=" + fullCargo.length + " opCode="+opCode);
108            } else {
109                throw new InvalidCRCException("CRC validation failed for: " + ((int) this.expectedOpCode) + ". a: " + Hex.encodeHexString(a) + " lastTwoB: " + Hex.encodeHexString(lastTwoB) + ". fullCargo len=" + fullCargo.length + " opCode="+opCode+" authKey="+new String(authKey));
110            }
111        } else if (this.isSigned) {
112            L.d(TAG, "validate(" + Hex.encodeHexString(authKey) + ") messageData: " + Hex.encodeHexString(messageData) + " len: " + messageData.length + " fullCargo: " + Hex.encodeHexString(fullCargo) + " len: " + fullCargo.length);
113            byte[] byteArray = Bytes.dropLastN(this.messageData, 20);
114            byte[] bArr2 = this.messageData;
115            byte[] expectedHmac = Bytes.dropFirstN(bArr2, bArr2.length - 20);
116            byte[] hmacSha = Packetize.doHmacSha1(byteArray, authKey);
117            if (!Arrays.equals(expectedHmac, hmacSha)) {
118                L.e(TAG, "Pump response invalid signature: expectedHmac=" + Hex.encodeHexString(expectedHmac)+" hmacSha="+Hex.encodeHexString(hmacSha));
119                if (shouldIgnoreInvalidHmac(authKey)) {
120                    return true;
121                }
122
123
124                throw new InvalidSignedMessageHMACSignatureException("Pump response invalid: SIGNATURE");
125            }
126        }
127        return ok;
128    }
129
130    protected void createMessageData() {
131        byte[] bArr = this.messageData;
132        bArr[0] = this.expectedOpCode;
133        bArr[1] = this.expectedTxId;
134        bArr[2] = this.expectedCargoSize;
135        this.messageData = Bytes.combine(bArr, Bytes.dropLastN(this.fullCargo, 2));
136    }
137
138    protected void parse(byte[] bArr) {
139        byte opCode = bArr[2];
140        int cargoSize = bArr[4];
141        if (cargoSize < 0 && cargoSize > -128) {
142            cargoSize += 256;
143        }
144        // ErrorResponse handling. Can have a dynamic cargo size in different situations.
145        if (77 == opCode && 2 == cargoSize) {
146            this.expectedOpCode = 77;
147            this.expectedCargoSize = 2;
148            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 2;
149            this.fullCargo = new byte[4];
150        } else if (77 == opCode && 26 == cargoSize) {
151            this.expectedOpCode = 77;
152            this.expectedCargoSize = 26;
153            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 26;
154            this.fullCargo = new byte[28];
155        }
156        // ApiVersionRequest can either have 0 cargo size or 2
157        // its cargo size is set as 2 in the MessageProps but we allow the 0-cargo here as well
158        if (32 == opCode && 0 == cargoSize) {
159            this.expectedCargoSize = 0;
160            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 0;
161        }
162        // CommonSoftwareInfoRequest can have cargo size 0 or 1
163        else if (-114 == opCode && 1 == cargoSize) {
164            this.expectedCargoSize = 1;
165            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 1;
166        }
167        // CommonSoftwareInfoResponse can have cargo size 60 or 51
168        else if (-113 == opCode && 51 == cargoSize) {
169            this.expectedCargoSize = 51;
170            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 51;
171        }
172        // MalfunctionStatusResponse can have cargo size 10 or 11
173        else if (121 == opCode && 10 == cargoSize) {
174            this.expectedCargoSize = 10;
175            this.actualExpectedCargoSize = 10;
176        }
177
178
179
180        if (opCode == this.expectedOpCode) {
181            this.firstByteMod15 = (byte) (bArr[0] & 15);
182            this.opCode = bArr[2];
183            byte txId = bArr[3];
184            L.d(TAG, "PacketArrayList firstByteMod15="+firstByteMod15+" opCode="+opCode+" txId="+txId+" expectedTxId="+expectedTxId+" bArr="+JavaHelpers.display(bArr));
185            if (txId != this.expectedTxId) {
186                throwUnexpectedTransactionIdException(txId);
187            } else if (cargoSize != this.actualExpectedCargoSize) {
188                if (cargoSize == this.actualExpectedCargoSize + 24 && isSigned) {
189                    L.d(TAG, "adding +24 expectedCargoSize for already signed request which contains an existing trailer");
190                    expectedCargoSize += 24;
191                    actualExpectedCargoSize += 24;
192                } else {
193                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unexpected cargo size: " + ((int) cargoSize) + ", expecting " + ((int) this.actualExpectedCargoSize) + " for opCode="+opCode);
194                }
195            }
196            this.fullCargo = Bytes.dropFirstN(bArr, 5);
197        } else {
198            throw new UnexpectedOpCodeException(opCode, this.expectedOpCode);
199        }
200        L.d(TAG, "PacketArrayParse ok: opCode="+opCode+" firstByteMod15="+firstByteMod15+" cargoSize="+cargoSize);
201    }
202
203
204    public void validatePacket(byte[] packetData) {
205        Validate.notNull(packetData, "packetData");
206        if (packetData.length == 0) {
207            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Empty data");
208        } else if (packetData.length >= 3) {
209            byte firstByteMod15 = (byte) (packetData[0] & 15);
210            byte secondByte = packetData[1];
211            L.d(TAG, "Found tx id: "+secondByte+" expected "+this.expectedTxId);
212            if (secondByte == this.expectedTxId) {
213                if (this.empty) {
214                    this.firstByteMod15 = firstByteMod15;
215                    L.d(TAG, "txid matches, firstByteMod15="+firstByteMod15+", parsing packetData");
216                    parse(packetData);
217                } else if (((byte) 0) == firstByteMod15) {
218                    L.d(TAG, "firstByteMod15=0");
219                    if (this.firstByteMod15 == firstByteMod15) {
220                        this.fullCargo = Bytes.combine(this.fullCargo, Bytes.dropFirstN(packetData, 2));
221                        L.d(TAG, "firstByteMod15 matches expected, fullCargo="+ Hex.encodeHexString(fullCargo));
222                    } else {
223                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unexpected packets remaining 3: " + ((int) firstByteMod15) + ", expected " + ((int) this.firstByteMod15) + ", opCode: " + ((int) this.expectedOpCode));
224                    }
225                } else if (this.firstByteMod15 == firstByteMod15) {
226                    this.fullCargo = Bytes.combine(this.fullCargo, Bytes.dropFirstN(packetData, 2));
227                    L.d(TAG, "firstByteMod15 matches expected, nonzero, fullCargo=" + Hex.encodeHexString(fullCargo));
228                } else {
229                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unexpected packets remaining 2: " + ((int) firstByteMod15) + ", expected " + ((int) this.firstByteMod15) + ", opCode: " + ((int) this.expectedOpCode));
230                }
231                this.empty = false;
232                this.firstByteMod15 = (byte) (this.firstByteMod15 - 1);
233                L.d(TAG, "validatePacket: decrementing firstByteMod15 to " + firstByteMod15);
234                return;
235            }
236            throwUnexpectedTransactionIdException(secondByte);
237        } else {
238            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid data size: " + packetData.length);
239        }
240    }
241
242    private void throwUnexpectedTransactionIdException(byte foundTxId) {
243        RuntimeException ex = new UnexpectedTransactionIdException(foundTxId, this.expectedTxId, this.expectedOpCode);
244        if (ignoreInvalidTxId) {
245            L.e(TAG, ex);
246            return;
247        }
248        throw ex;
249    }
250
251    private boolean shouldIgnoreInvalidHmac(byte[] authKey) {
252        return Arrays.equals(
253                Arrays.copyOfRange(authKey, 0, IGNORE_INVALID_HMAC.length()),
254                Arrays.copyOfRange(IGNORE_INVALID_HMAC.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8), 0, IGNORE_INVALID_HMAC.length())
255        );
256    }
257
258    public String toString() {
259        return JavaHelpers.autoToString(this, Set.of());
260    }
261
262    public static class InvalidCRCException extends RuntimeException {
263        InvalidCRCException(String message) {
264            super(message);
265        }
266    }
267
268    public static class InvalidSignedMessageHMACSignatureException extends RuntimeException {
269        InvalidSignedMessageHMACSignatureException(String message) {
270            super(message);
271        }
272    }
273}
